title: My Epic Daily Checklist
subtitle: Because adulting is hard, but checkboxes make it fun! âœ¨

header.author: Your Future Self
header.customHeader: Remember: You're doing great, even if you only check off one thing! ğŸ¯

items.text: Actually get out of bed (not just sit up)

items.notes: Your body will thank you later

items.text: Check emails (but don't get lost in the void)
items.notes: Set a timer! Email black holes are real

items.text: Take a lunch break (away from your desk)
items.notes: Your brain needs a break too!

items.text: Do that thing you've been procrastinating
items.notes: You know what it is. Just do it!
Even 10 minutes of dancing in your room counts
Spread some love and good vibes

items.text: Do something that makes you smile
items.notes: Life is too short to be serious all the time

items.text: Go to bed at a reasonable hour
items.notes: Your future self will thank you (and so will your alarm)

footer.customFooter: Remember: Progress, not perfection! Every checked box is a victory! ğŸ†
